title: The Bee's Knees
summaries: The Bee's Knees is a pre-Hardmode bow that, when consuming Wooden Arrows as ammo, fires special Bee Arrow projectiles which resemble lines of bees. Bee Arrows are unaffected by gravity and disperse upon impact with an enemy or solid block, spawning three small homing bee projectiles with three independent 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chances to spawn an extra bee. The bee projectiles deal 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) of the weapon and ammo's damage (9 base damage) before dissipating after a 10-second duration or upon contact with water or lava, and have a 50*1/2 (50%) chance to deal 1 extra damage. Individual bees can pierce one enemy or ricochet off of blocks once, but never both simultaneously. The Bee's Knees has a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance of being dropped by the Queen Bee.

statistics.Tooltip: Wooden arrows turn into a column of bees
